title: How to Shoot a Rubber Band With One Hand

steps.headline: Hold the rubber band with your little (or fourth) finger (tight.)
Wrap the rubber band around the base of your thumb.
Point your index finger and latch the rubber band to the tip of it.
Make the shape of a gun with your hand.
Loosen up the friction between the rubber band and your little finger, the rubber band should then shoot.

text: Get a rubber band.  Hold the rubber band with your little (or fourth) finger (tight.)  Wrap the rubber band around the base of your thumb.  Point your index finger and latch the rubber band to the tip of it.  Make the shape of a gun with your hand.  Loosen up the friction between the rubber band and your little finger, the rubber band should then shoot.
